title: fpo-a33002-01
text: NEW PROGRAM PROPOSAL FORM (FPO-A33002-01) * The Task Force is expected to prepare a presentation about the proposed program and submit it to the relevant Faculty/Institute (several units if the proposed program has inter-faculty nature). The presentation should provide a summary of the Task Force’s work and the Program Proposal Form. Please consult to the “Coordination of Programs and Courses Instruction Letter” for further details. ** http://www.tyyc.yok.gov.tr/
